name: Light Gravity Cube
description:
Light Gravity Cube is a endless infinite maze runner with simple, yet good graphics and style.

It is an one touch and swipe arcade game which also includes many surprises that will make the game really enjoyable
In Light Gravity Cube you will have to face an infinite labyrinth full of obstacles and objects that will make progress difficult and make you lose. You have to use 100% to get the most advance and get more score, encourage yourself to improve yourself!

Some features:

-Score System

-Slow motion effect

-Long lasting endless experience

-Endless level generation.

- Random color generator to switch your background and environment color.

- Over 25+ different obstacles

-Background music
